Authority user configuration.

A string identifier which only uses alphanumerics, underscores,
or dashes, and cannot exceed 63 characters.

children.value: Must contain only alphanumeric characters or any of the following: _ -

children.text:
The identifier for the Authority to which this user
configuration applies.
Password policy mode.

Moderate mode is the default level of password
strictness

A list of named roles that define a set of rules that
may be assigned to users.

children.value: Must begin with a lower case character and contain lower case alphanumeric characters or the following: _ -

children.text: A name that represents the role.

A string identifier which only uses alphanumerics, underscores,
or dashes, and cannot exceed 63 characters.

children.value: Must contain only alphanumeric characters or any of the following: _ -

children.text:
This type is used by other entities that need to reference
configured rules.

A string identifier which only uses alphanumerics, underscores,
or dashes, and cannot exceed 63 characters.

children.value: Must contain only alphanumeric characters or any of the following: _ -

children.text: The rules that apply to this role.

A string identifier which only uses alphanumerics, underscores,
or dashes, and cannot exceed 63 characters.

children.value: Must contain only alphanumeric characters or any of the following: _ -

children.text: A name that represents the rule.

Whether to allow or deny access to the parameters
described by this rule.

Access to the parameter(s) associated with
this rule is allowed.

Access to the parameter(s) associated with
this rule is denied.

A regular expression that defines a set of
commands.
A group of features to which this rule applies.
The ability to configure the system.

The ability to execute commands
that show system state.
User Account Configuration.

A string identifier which only uses alphanumerics, underscores,
or dashes, and cannot exceed 63 characters.

children.value: Must contain only alphanumeric characters or any of the following: _ -

children.text:
An identifier for the router to which this user
configuration applies.
A list of users local to this router.
UserPasswordAuthentication
The name this user will use to authenticate.

children.value: Must begin with a lower case character and contain lower case alphanumeric characters or the following: _ -

children.text: Authenticated on the local system.
Authenticated using a remote system.
How the user will be authenticated.
The user's full name, for display purposes only.

children.value: Must not contain colons or commas

children.text: Enable or disable this user.

A password type that is hidden from the UI. The internal storage
format is dependent on the individual field.
The password this user will use to authenticate.

A string identifier which only uses alphanumerics, underscores,
or dashes, and cannot exceed 63 characters.

children.value: Must contain only alphanumeric characters or any of the following: _ -

children.text: A role identifier that corresponds with the roles within the resource-group in the main config store
The user's PCLI settings.
